system.description:
Prerequisites

Spellschool (Any) 4 Ranks, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.mm-rulebook.Item.CEdyF0fS2BRXlARl]{Practiced Stylus}

Benefits

When attacking with a stylus, a mage can choose to double the range increment of their stylus. If they do, they receive a -1 damage penalty for every 2 damage dice they have, rounded down

Special

A mage must have at least 2 damage dice in order to use the benefits from this feat. The features of this feat may not be combined with the Power Stylus Feat.
